ProductInfo.Features:
The LRH50 Series TH-42LRH50U is a Professional Healthcare-Grade 42-inch LCD HDTV built for patient room, lobby and waiting room use in hospitals, medical care centers, nursing homes and other healthcare facilities in accordance with UL 60065 Annex Q Safety Requirements. Features include space-saving design, built-in tri-band tuners, hidden speakers and energy-saving efficiency, along with Panasonic's reputation for high production quality and low maintenance and repair rates. Weighing just 39.1 lbs. with a depth of 4.2 inches, TH-42LRH50U is easily wall mounted and provides patients and visitors with a flat screen, high definition viewing experience. The display's SD card slot allows viewing of digital camera images saved on SD Memory Cards, so visitors and medical personnel can easily share pictures.
